SELECT
DISTINCT
`tbsu`.* FROM tb_basic_sys_user as `tbsu`
GROUP BY
`tbsu`.`#{field}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysUserPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
DISTINCT
`tbsu`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_user as `tbsu`
GROUP BY
`tbsu`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysUserPo.havingClause}

SELECT MAX(
DISTINCT
`tbsu`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_user as `tbsu`
GROUP BY
`tbsu`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysUserPo.havingClause}

SELECT MIN(
DISTINCT
`tbsu`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_user as `tbsu`

`tbsu`.`#{groupField}`
